issue.title: [C++] Optimize for ordered JSON fields
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4709](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4709). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Fields appear consistently ordered in most JSON data in the wild, but the JSON parser currently looks fields up in a hash table. The ordering can probably be exploited to yield better performance when looking up field indices
